result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Clinton D. Boyles
Current: 2403 County Rd C, Mosinee, WI 54455 United States  (Effective: 11-10-2016)
Prior: 1215 County Hwy C, Mosinee, WI 54455 United States

ADDRESS INFO for Clinton D. Boyles
Current: 1215 County Hwy C, Mosinee, WI 54455 United States  (Effective: 03-31-2016)
Prior: 1215 Pinecrest Avenue, Mosinee, WI 54455

Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 10:15am
INCLUDES 15CM1834 & 15CM2416
State appears by ADA Michael Puerner.  Deft appears in person, in custody, with Atty Lou Ann Bohn.

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
15CM1834: Ct. 2 Disorderly conduct- domestic abuse >> D&RI
15CM2416: Ct. 1 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
COURT grants above

PLEA: 
15CM1834:
Ct. 1 Battery- domestic abuse >> NO CONTEST
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & deft guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: w/hold sentencing. 18 months probation. CONDITIONS: Complete SAFE intake program and any follow through. Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of two, when not fully engaged complete 10 hours of community service per week. No contact with B.S. unless allowed by agent. Pay CC. Pay DNA sample and surcharge. Pay one domestic abuse surcharge. If revoked, 7 days credit granted. Cash bond posted be returned to poster. 

Adj: 10:25am

No contact with victim(s): J.B., B.S. (non-waivable).  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
